TITLE: Welcome to Web GO
DESCRIPTION: Web GO follows the best practices outlined in Web Fundamentals.
SUBTITLE: Boilerplate Code

CONTENT.WEB: A boilerplate for HTML5, Material, Firebase, Gulp, Rollup, Babel, Reshape, and PostCSS.
CONTENT.BACKEND: A boilerplate for Node.js, Express, Mongoose, Heroku, mLab, Nodemon, PM2, and Babel.
